comment: She's so easy! You can do the homework as many times as you want until you get a 100 and her tests are easy and straightforward and she prepares you for them. I am awful at math and got an A! Take her!

She teaches straight from her notes. Doesn't use vista, but she does offer an alternative email and talks before & after class. She moves fast if people don't ask questions. The extra credit helps a lot. The homework will help pass the test. Only used the textbook via mymathlab in class for practice problems.

She is very nice and loves to ask how you're doing and help you make life decisions. She does not do that great of a job explaining in class and she expects everyone to go to the study sessions but they do not fit in everyones schedule.  Her tests were extremely hard and the homework is so time consuming because there is so much you don't study.
Awesome teacher! Knows her stuff! Knows how to teach in a way that everyone can understand! Lots of extra credit on tests! Super easy! Take her!!!

Professor Johnston is awesome! I HATE math, but she teaches it in a way that can make you succeed! If you have trouble understanding something, she stops and explains everything step by step. Gives 10 extra credit points on each test 3 tests, final, and 15% on homework... TAKE HER!!!

You couldn't ask for a better professor. Super easy, yet you learn a lot in her class. Helpful when you want her to be, but leaves you alone if you work at your own pace. Homework isn't bad at all, and it prepares you for the tests that are easy as long as you give the slightest amount of effort. Really cool and approachable as well. Take her class
She is terrific!  I am horrible at math, but she is totally thorough & makes sure her students understand. She's fast, but extremely good.  TAKE HER CLASS!  You will learn a lot!
I had her for college algebra and I've always struggled with math. She really knew her stuff and how to teach it! Plus she gives 10 extra credit points on every test. Love her, definitely recommend.

I have Mrs. Johnston for College Algebra and she is a great professor! Always willing to help. And her class is super easy! She gives up to 10 points extra credit on every test. Do your hmwk, attend class, and you'll get an A! On top of being easy, it's also a class I enjoy attending. You also get out of class early everyday. Take her!
LOVE THIS PROFESSOR! She is good at what she does! Def. recommend!
SO nice and helpful. She is young so understands not to waste our time and usually lets us out early. If you d the notes youll do fine on the tests

GREAT PROFESSOR! Notes are clear and she explains everything thoroughly. All her notes and homework are posted online and are extremely helpful. If you complete the homework before a test she adds 10 bonus points to your test grade. Class usually always ends early. If you want an A take her! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!

GREAT PROFESSOR! Her notes are clear and she does a lot of examples to make sure you understand it. All her notes and homework are posted online. If you complete the homework before a test she gives 10 bonus points on your test grade! She does this for all tests. If you want an A take her! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!

I love this teacher! She is so nice and very easy. All you have to do for the class is the homework, and if you finish the homework before a test she will give you 10 extra credit points. She will also drop the lowest test grade, so you don't even have to take the final if you already have a good grade. Also, the class always ends early!
